name: AddDashboardCollaborator
description:
Add a collaborator to a specific dashboard.

Use this tool to add a collaborator to a specified dashboard within a project environment on Datadog.

parameters.name: dashboard_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the dashboard to which the collaborator is being added. It must be an integer value.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to access. Retrieve using the /api/projects/ endpoint.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: collaborator_details
parameters.description: JSON object with collaborator’s details including 'id', 'dashboard_id', 'user', 'level', 'added_at', 'updated_at', and 'user_uuid'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
